patthana1.7:98.1_1: There is no conditions for the arising and passing away.
patthana1.7:99.1_0: They achieve the cause of the seventy. There are twenty-five years old. There are twenty-five years old. There are twenty-five years old. There are seven hundred and eight stages in the presence of eat. There are seven hundred and twenty years old. No more.
